page.title: 09Hartlepool Public Transport
page.content: Fares begin at 10p for the first stage; 17p-2nd; 22p-3rd; 25p-4th; 27p-5th; 30p-6,7,8th; 35p-9 to 13th stage. Cleveland Transit run a commuter service principally for Hartlepudlians travelling to Middlesbrough to take advantage of the bigger shops and bigger shopping centre. The Trimdon Motor Service is largely used to carry people from the outlying villages of County Durham into Hartlepool. The United Bus Company operates services to Saltburn, Sunderland, Newcastle, Durham, Bishop Auckland, Darlington, Stockton, Redcar Middlesbrough, Broughton, and Eston. The Northern General Transport Company operate a similar service to United with similar destinations.
